meanings.definition: A two-wheeled vehicle with a motor.
meanings.sent1: My uncle owns a shiny motorcycle.
meanings.sent2: I saw a red motorcycle zooming past us.
meanings.sent3: The motorcycle parked next to the elephant made for an amusing sight.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the roar of a motorcycle, loud and infectious.
meanings.sent5: The motorcycle's engine purred like a contented cat.

meanings.definition: To ride or travel on a motorcycle.
meanings.sent1: I love to motorcycle through the countryside on weekends.
meanings.sent2: She will motorcycle to work when the weather is nice.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a penguin trying to motorcycle is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts would motorcycle through his mind at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The memories of that day motorcycle through my mind like a movie reel.
